---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Submitted By: Het Suthar (201911042), Swaresh Phadke (201911034), Vishank Makhe (201911044)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Top Module - processor.v 

2. Python Script contains a script to convert assembly langauge program to binary representation.

	'./python_script/myfile.data' and './python_script/myfile2.data' contains two test programs 	generated by the compiler.py program.

3. ins_mem is initialized by either one of these .data files.

4. reg_bank is initialized to r1 = 0x05, r2 = 0x05 and all other registers (r0,r3-r7) to 0x00.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>> Program Written in myfile.data:
addi r7,r7,#7
addi r6,r7,#7
or r5,r6,r7
sub r4,r6,r7
add r3,r4,r7
andi r0,r3,#7
addi r0,r0,#5

>>> Expected Output
r0 = 0x05
r1 = unchanged
r2 = unchanged
r3 = 0x08
r4 = 0x01
r5 = 0x0f
r6 = 0x0e
r7 = 0x07
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>> Program Written in myfile2.data
add r0,r1,r2
addi r3,r0,#2
add r4,r3,r3

>>> Expected Output
r0 = 0x0a
r1 = unchanged
r2 = unchanged
r3 = 0x0c
r4 = 0x18
